   315	    def profile_max_num_token(self, total_gpu_memory: int):
   316	        available_gpu_memory = get_available_gpu_memory(
   317	            self.gpu_id, distributed=self.tp_size > 1
   318	        )
   319	        if (
   320	            self.model_config.attention_arch == AttentionArch.MLA
   321	            and self.server_args.enable_mla

   323	            cell_size = (
   324	                (self.model_config.kv_lora_rank + self.model_config.qk_rope_head_dim)
   325	                * self.model_config.num_hidden_layers
   326	                * torch._utils._element_size(self.kv_cache_dtype)
   327	            )
   328	        else:
   329	            cell_size = (
   330	                self.model_config.get_num_kv_heads(self.tp_size)
   331	                * self.model_config.head_dim
   332	                * self.model_config.num_hidden_layers
   333	                * 2
   334	                * torch._utils._element_size(self.kv_cache_dtype)
   335	            )
   336	        rest_memory = available_gpu_memory - total_gpu_memory * (
   337	            1 - self.mem_fraction_static
   338	        )
   339	        max_num_token = int(rest_memory * (1 << 30) // cell_size)
   340	        return max_num_token

   228	    def update_weights(self, model_path: str, load_format: str):
   229	        """Update weights in-place."""
   230	        from vllm.model_executor.model_loader.loader import (
   231	            DefaultModelLoader,

   236	
   237	        logger.info(
   238	            f"Update weights begin. "
   239	            f"avail mem={get_available_gpu_memory(self.gpu_id):.2f} GB"
   240	        )
   241	
   242	        target_device = torch.device(self.device_config.device)
   243	
   244	        try:
   245	            # TODO: Use a better method to check this
   246	            vllm_model_config = VllmModelConfig(
   247	                model=model_path,

   252	                dtype=self.server_args.dtype,
   253	                seed=42,
   254	                skip_tokenizer_init=True,
   255	            )
   256	        except Exception as e:
   257	            logger.error(f"Failed to load model config: {e}")
   258	            return False, "Failed to update model weights"
   259	
   260	        load_config = LoadConfig(load_format=load_format)
   261	
   262	        # Only support vllm DefaultModelLoader for now
   263	        loader = get_model_loader(load_config)
   264	        if not isinstance(loader, DefaultModelLoader):
   265	            logger.error("Failed to get weights iterator: Unsupported loader")
   266	            return False, "Failed to update model weights"
   267	
   268	        def get_weight_iter(config):
   269	            iter = loader._get_weights_iterator(
   270	                config.model,
   271	                config.revision,
   272	                fall_back_to_pt=getattr(
   273	                    self.model, "fall_back_to_pt_during_load", True
   274	                ),
   275	            )

   278	        def model_load_weights(model, iter):
   279	            model.load_weights(iter)
   280	            for _, module in self.model.named_modules():
   281	                quant_method = getattr(module, "quant_method", None)
   282	                if quant_method is not None:
   283	                    with device_loading_context(module, target_device):
   284	                        quant_method.process_weights_after_loading(module)
   285	            return model

   287	        with set_default_torch_dtype(vllm_model_config.dtype):
   288	            try:

   290	            except Exception as e:
   291	                message = f"Failed to get weights iterator: {e}"
   292	                logger.error(message)
   293	                return False, message
   294	            try:
   295	                model = model_load_weights(self.model, iter)
   296	            except Exception as e:
   297	                message = f"Failed to update weights: {e}. \n Rolling back to original weights"
   298	                logger.error(message)
   299	                del iter
   300	                gc.collect()
   301	                iter = get_weight_iter(self.vllm_model_config)
   302	                self.model = model_load_weights(self.model, iter)
   303	                return False, message

   305	        self.model = model

   309	        self.load_config = load_config
   310	        self.model_config.path = model_path

   315	    def profile_max_num_token(self, total_gpu_memory: int):
   316	        available_gpu_memory = get_available_gpu_memory(
   317	            self.gpu_id, distributed=self.tp_size > 1
   318	        )
   319	        if (
   320	            self.model_config.attention_arch == AttentionArch.MLA
   321	            and self.server_args.enable_mla
   322	        ):
   323	            cell_size = (
   324	                (self.model_config.kv_lora_rank + self.model_config.qk_rope_head_dim)
   325	                * self.model_config.num_hidden_layers
   326	                * torch._utils._element_size(self.kv_cache_dtype)
   327	            )
   328	        else:
   329	            cell_size = (
   330	                self.model_config.get_num_kv_heads(self.tp_size)
   331	                * self.model_config.head_dim
   332	                * self.model_config.num_hidden_layers
   333	                * 2
   334	                * torch._utils._element_size(self.kv_cache_dtype)
   335	            )
   336	        rest_memory = available_gpu_memory - total_gpu_memory * (
   337	            1 - self.mem_fraction_static
   338	        )
   339	        max_num_token = int(rest_memory * (1 << 30) // cell_size)
   340	        return max_num_token
